channel.title: Guildminer
channel.description: With the removal of the statue in the mini-map the guildminers I have no longer work. Does anyone think they could code a new one? Or maybe just edit Stupid3ooo's so it doesn't need the statue to walk around?

ps: i suppose i’m a leecher, but I dont complain and am takeing strides to learn programs. I understand a bit

item.title: Guildminer
item.dc:creator: @phantombmx phantombmx
item.description:
@phantombmx wrote:

Pwnd, I just did explain it basically. By the way: I am not known to this community, but I am active on saradomin.net.

SCAR is not my expertise; however, I do know programming and I can fully understand any pascal or visual basic programming languages. This means that I can possibly solve problems given to me. Thanks Pwned, and have a nice day.

Oh and one last thing, I am not being rude. I am just trying to stop you from flaming the ‘uneducated scripters’.

item.title: Guildminer
item.dc:creator: @phantombmx phantombmx
item.description:
@phantombmx wrote:

I’ll have to check it out but I’m sure the only thing you really need to do to fix it is like this:

Before the statue:

FindColorTolerence(statue,x,y,20) Mouse(x+random(3) ,y+random(3))
Somethin like that so it would find the statue color with tolerence and click random(#) above the statue…

All you would have to do is change it to something like:

FindColorTolerence(ladderbox,x,y,20) Mouse(x+random(3) ,y+random(3))
This would find the color of the box of 4 ladders with tolerence and click random(#) to the right of it…

Someone who knows different please correct me…

I will look over it now to see.

Read full topic

item.title: Guildminer
item.dc:creator: @440SixPak 440SixPak
item.description:
@440SixPak wrote:

Pwnd:

Well, when you see a single person only complaining, you seem to get annoyed ;p

When rule #1 is we’re not anti-leech yeah it does annoy me bro. Hell, I don’t like being a leecher myself, but I don’t understand the first thing about coding. Ask me to strip down a 318 to the bare block and rebuild it to factory specs in a day and I’ll do it no problem. Ask me to write you the first few lines of a script though and I’ll just sit there with drool dribbling down my chin.

Read full topic
